snippet: Opel's chief executive warned senior managers at the European arm of General Motors that they needed to step up their game to reach a target of returning to profit by 2016, according to German daily paper Bild....

headline.print_headline: Opel CEO Warns 2016 Profit Target 'by Far Not Secured'-Bild
headline.main: Opel CEO Warns 2016 Profit Target 'by Far Not Secured'-Bild

lead_paragraph: Opel's chief executive warned senior managers at the European arm of General Motors that they needed to step up their game to reach a target of returning to profit by 2016, according to German daily paper Bild.
